item.description: A FAREWELL DINNER ?.......YES.......a farewell to the year 2012 and the new start of a wonderful year for all in 2013.....We have been here before....if you like steak, this restaurant is simply the best....A wide selection of delicious entrees are alsoÂ available....check out the menu....http://www.jgilberts.com/Locations/826/Menus/Dinner_1.pdf....reservations are made for 8 people..A fun night for sure......just like last time we visited......
item.how_to_find_us: a warm welcome by chuck 860-729-4504 my email chuckles125@att.net

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford
